prompt: Design a pastoral riverside village with a market square

requirements.user_request: Design a pastoral riverside village with a market square
requirements.error_analysis: Previous attempt failed due to 'Orchestrator returned an incomplete payload' - caused by insufficient detail in asset specifications

residential.details: Half-timbered construction with whitewashed walls, thatched or slate roofs, 2-3 story buildings measuring 8m x 6m x 8m (LxWxH)

commercial.details: Single-story stone or timber buildings with overhangs, 6m x 5m x 4m (LxWxH), various trades represented

community.name: Town Hall
community.details: Two-story stone construction, 12m x 8m x 10m (LxWxH) with 6m diameter clock tower rising 15m

community.name: Church
community.type: Gothic stone church with bell tower
community.details: 20m x 10m x 12m (LxWxH) main structure with 5m x 5m bell tower rising 20m

community.name: Inn/Tavern

industrial.name: Water Mill

infrastructure.name: Covered Wooden Bridge
infrastructure.details: 15m long x 4m wide x 5m high covered bridge with steep-pitched roof

infrastructure.name: Stone Dock
infrastructure.details: 20m long x 3m wide x 1m high stone dock with timber cleats

paths.details: 1.5m wide winding dirt paths connecting village elements

foliage.name: Oak Trees
foliage.details: Full-grown oak trees 15m tall for shade and pastoral feel

foliage.name: Apple Trees
foliage.details: 3m tall apple trees in small orchard near residential area

foliage.name: Flower Beds
foliage.details: Small flower beds 2m x 1m with wildflowers and herbs

market_elements.name: Market Stalls
